attributes.action: Proposed Fire Station In Bowden Houstead Woods Sheffield
attributes.additional_details:
Proposal to erect  a Fire station by South Yorkshire Fire and Rescue on Greenfield Site in Ancient Woodland at Bowden Houstead Woods Sheffield.
Ideally the government will stop this proposal on this precious site and insist on the use of freely available Brownfield sites which are plentifully available in this area, and in doing so safeguard a precious local and well loved amenity.
